whatIsTransliteration.question: What is transliteration?
whatIsTransliteration.answer: Transliteration is the process of converting text from one script to another. TranslitPro converts Latin characters (like "privet") into other scripts (like "Ð¿Ñ€Ð¸Ð²ÐµÑ‚" in Russian) in real-time as you type.

whichLanguages.question: Which languages are supported?
whichLanguages.answer: TranslitPro has 13+ languages built-in: Russian, Ukrainian, Belarusian, Bulgarian, Hebrew, Armenian, Georgian, Greek, Lithuanian, Tajik, Rusyn, Kazakh, and more. You can also add your own custom languages and keyboard layouts.

mobileOrDesktop.question: Is TranslitPro for mobile or desktop?
mobileOrDesktop.answer: TranslitPro is primarily designed for desktop users. Mobile users typically have built-in keyboards for different scripts. Our app works best on desktop browsers where you want to type in non-Latin scripts using your standard keyboard.

whatIsBookmarklet.question: What is the bookmarklet?
whatIsBookmarklet.answer: The bookmarklet (Pro only) lets you type in your target script directly on most websites. It works on social media, forums, and many web apps. Note: It doesn't work on sites with strict Content Security Policy (CSP) like Google services (Gmail, Docs, etc.).

beyondTransliteration.question: What can I do beyond transliteration?
beyondTransliteration.answer: TranslitPro includes a powerful rich text editor, translation to multiple languages, AI-powered spellcheck in your target language, and export to TXT, RTF, HTML, Markdown, DOCX, or PDF.

freeTrial.question: Is there a free trial?
freeTrial.answer: Yes! You can use the basic transliteration features completely free, forever. When you sign up, you also get a trial of Pro features including the bookmarklet, AI spellcheck, and cloud storage.

addOwnLanguage.question: Can I add my own language?
addOwnLanguage.answer: Yes! With a Basic plan or higher, you can create custom transliteration schemas and keyboard layouts for any language. Perfect if you need a specific romanization system or a language not built into the app.

cancelAnytime.question: Can I cancel my subscription anytime?
cancelAnytime.answer: Absolutely! You can cancel your subscription at any time from your account settings. You'll continue to have access to paid features until the end of your billing period.
